talk0030:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Hey, hold on a minute! <sp:5:1:0>You may have
the chief's favor, but...

I'd rather you didn't speak to my
students, OK?

If you have questions about this class,
talk to me.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, voe. We Gerudo have a saying.


"For young vai, speaking with a voe will
only invite misfortune!"

<snd:Think>Vai learn that at an early age, so even
though you're allowed to be here, please
leave the young ones be.
talk0031:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>My vaba said it was OK if I talked to you.


That means I don't have to hide my face
anymore! Yay!

<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c00>But also, Ms. Ashai said that it's still not OK, so
maybe we can keep this a secret?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0032:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Angry_00>Hey, hold on a minute! <sp:5:1:0>You may have
really helped the town, but...

I'd rather you didn't speak to my
students, OK?

If you have questions about this class,
talk to me.
talk0016:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>R-really? <sp:5:0:0>Are you telling the truth?<sp:5:0:0>
I learned in the <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff> that all voe like
to lie though...
talk0033:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Notice>Ms. Ashai says it's still not OK to chat with voe...


You're gonna get in trouble if you stay here!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:SurpriseS_00>I know I asked you already, but...<sp:5:0:0>
You're a real voe?
talk0034: <sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Notice_00>Sorry, I'm kind of in a hurry right now...
talk0018:
<snd:Think>Honestly, I wouldn't mind talking with
you, but then my vaba would get mad
at me...
<snd:Think>Besides, I learned that it's best to know
how voe live before really talking to them.

Ms. Ashai talked about that in the <clr:0000>class<clr:ffff>.
So that means it's still too soon to talk
to voe!
talk0035:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:Think>Whenever I go to the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000> class<clr:ffff>,
I have to sneak off without my little sister,
Makure, noticing.
If I don't, she'll follow me to the class.
I usually slip away when she's busy with
the shop...
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Anyway, if you want to talk, find me after
class is over. <sp:5:1:0>Sav'orq!
talk0036:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>That huge picture that appeared on the
mountain to the north...<sp:5:0:0> It looks scary
at night.
talk0037:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>If my little sister, Makure, spots me, she
always follows me to the "<clr:0000>Voe and You<clr:ffff>"<clr:0000>
class<clr:ffff>.
I try to sneak away for lessons when she's
helping at the shop...

<snd:TalkPositive>That's why I need to get back there now
though! I don't want her to realize I've
been gone!
talk0020:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I knew it! I knew you wouldn't answer
honestly! <clr:0000>Class<clr:ffff> taught me that all voe like
to lie!
talk0024:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Ugh... Of all the things you could've
learned to do at your age, why is arguing
the one you've taken such a liking to?
talk0025:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep>Makure... <sp:5:0:0>You can't follow me...<sp:5:0:0> You're
not old enough for class...
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM>Ah! We made eye contact! No, no, it's
fine! We'll just pretend we didn't!
talk0026:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Sleep>I'm gonna be an amazing vai... <sp:5:0:0>Just you
wait and see...
talk0028:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>A lot of the guards have been adding little
things to their weapons lately, but do you
know who started the trend?
It was my vaba!


Even Buliara, who left for <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>
already, was super interested in the idea!

I guess she had folks trying all different
kinds of materials on their weapons!

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>I'm really proud of my vaba!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! Kalani! You'd better not be talking
to that voe!

Why don't you follow Makure's example?
Be more like your sister!
talk0029:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughL>Thank you for buying sooo much!


Are you going to try attaching Chuchu
jelly to a weapon?
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS>It's fine! I haven't made eye contact, so
it's all fine!
